title: Big Shoutout To The Amazing Riot Company
body:
I'm in Alabama and I have 300 ping with AT&T. Thank you Riot for the great server change. I'm glad I'll only have to wait years before it's fixed. I played with 130 ping for years now this upgrade to 300 is amazing. 

I can shoot my ult and you better watch out, 15 seconds later shit is about to go down. Sometimes I like to type to the enemy during the delay and let them know I just used all of my abilities on them and in about 8 seconds they might die from it. 

Thank you Riot for this amazing change you always manage to shock and awe me. Maybe it's a sign for me to switch to a server across the world, because believe or not I actually have better ping on the EU server.
